name: Warsect

aura.name: hard_armor
aura.description: When fighting together, increases player's defense and applies Fire damage to the player's attacks.

description:
The ultra-hard armor surrounding its body is extremely strong and heat resistant.
Even a napalm blast would hardly leave a scratch.

skills.name: wind_cutter
skills.description: Fires a high speed blade of wind that flies straight at an enemy.

skills.name: seed_machine_gun
skills.description: Fires a volley of hard seeds at enemies in front of it.

skills.name: stone_blast
skills.description: Fires a barrage of stones forward.

skills.name: stone_cannon
skills.description: Digs up a boulder and hurls it at an enemy.

skills.name: giga_horn
skills.description: Warsect's exclusive skill. Skewers enemies with its four sturdy horns.

skills.name: rock_lance
skills.description: Generates a sharp rock spear under an enemy.

skills.name: solar_blast
skills.description: Charges solar energy before blasting enemies with a powerful beam.
